doc:
William Demarest https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Demarest 0 Carl William Demarest (February 27, 1892 – December 27, 1983) was an American character actor, known for playing Uncle Charley in My Three Sons. A veteran of World War I, Demarest became a prolific film and television actor, appearing in over 140 films, beginning in 1927 and ending in the 1970s. He frequently played crusty but good-hearted roles. Carl_William_Demarest ( February_27_,_1892 – December_27_,_1983 ) was an_American_character_actor , known for playing Uncle_Charley in My_Three_Sons . A_veteran of World_War_I , Demarest became a_prolific_film_and_television_actor , appearing in over_140_films , beginning in 1927 and ending in the_1970s . He frequently played crusty_but_good-hearted_roles .
